scripts.build: echo interfaces are built waaay before Rush build step
scripts.generate-koa-server: rm -fr ${npm_package_config_server_dir} && npx concord node --nocompile --server koa -o ${npm_package_config_server_dir} ${npm_package_name}-koa-server@${npm_package_version} src/db.ts
scripts.generate-node-client: rm -fr ${npm_package_config_client_dir} && npx concord --allow-extra-props node --nocompile --client fetch -o ${npm_package_config_client_dir} ${npm_package_name}-node-client@${npm_package_version} src/db.ts
